name: HWUT - The Hello-Worldler's Unit Test
short_description: System und unit test tool. Programming Language and Operating System independent. As a Counterpoint to the *Unit Family it does not rely on explicit asserts. Only prerequisit: How to get a 'Hello World' program to run.
